title: So how long have these 3rd party bans been going on for?
body: Trying to figure something out is all.

replies.body: They do ban waves all the time.

probably just recently, since all the complaints have been coming in very rapidly, its probably Riot's scanning system, picking up an irregularity and flagging accounts that shouldn't be banned, Riot fucked up, noone else besides though rare accounts that actually use illegal 3rd party programs.
Not really, they've been doing this for years, and they always flood the boards saying 'I WAS UNRIGHTFULLY BANNED", those people are scripters, this is nothing new.
